channel.title: Dream Nation <(^^,)> 420 server!
channel.description:
Hi, im Mr arrows95 some might know me from <Project bottom B>
Im working on a 420 now Named "Dream Nation <(^^,)> i decided 508's aren't my thing..
My goals
100% Fishing finished 50% Cooking 40% Smithing 80% Mining 100% rune crafting 0% Farming 100% Woodcutting 50% Magic - Works on Players only 0% God wars Map data
My Idea. My idea is to have a 1 starting place with two portals you talk to the person in front of the portals They tell you How each "World" will be Red will obviously be the evil area with only Evil looking NPC's Blue Will be the good area with Good looking NPC's
Red = Underground Blue = Above ground
After you choose your destiny you will be stuck in the place you chose So if you go to threw the blue portal you cant go back. But you can PK each other it will be hard splitting up the world but its a challenge im willing to take on
UPDATE: Im now allowing people to meet at certain places in the world like Slayer/Training ETC. But they will have there own training areas if people want to train at them
UPDATE: There will be a "Guthix Area" where people shop it will be a island made by myself so nobody can get to varrock,falador etc, my goal in this server is to get rid of the main land basically
another UPDATE: im making to separate quests "Saradmoin's Blessing" "Zamorak Sacrifice" il most likely add more quests but it will be alot of time before i actually finish them
Story: You were a fisherman fishing for Rock crabs when your boat crashed you died and you have a choice of what kind of after life you want to live You have a choice between Zamorak and Saradmoin
Saradmoin is obviously good so if you choose that you will lead a good life Skilling/quests But if you choose zamorak you get to PK and And train i skillers will get to sell sharks/smithing items ETC. They will meet at the "Guthix" area where they shop for basic items skillers would sell sharks and Crafted items for money
If you support just say "I support" In the replies ideas and feedback are welcome I will add pictures as i improve[code][/code]
Im still working on this if anybody still cares

item.title: Dream Nation <(^^,)> 420 server!
item.dc:creator: @mr_arrows95 bansil
item.description:
@mr_arrows95 wrote:

[quote=“Si Force, post:19, topic:325455”]I have a small suggestion for this; at each of the homes, have an npc that you may talk to so that players may revert to the other clan, or whatever it is. This will give the player a bit more of an open experience possibly, as personally if I chose the evil clan, I would find being stuck underground 80% of the time to be a bit depressing (20% or whatever is when you’re up pk’ing the others).[/quote]Thanks for the suggestion Si force i might acutally do that

Read full topic

item.title: Dream Nation <(^^,)> 420 server!
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

I have a small suggestion for this; at each of the homes, have an npc that you may talk to so that players may revert to the other clan, or whatever it is. This will give the player a bit more of an open experience possibly, as personally if I chose the evil clan, I would find being stuck underground 80% of the time to be a bit depressing (20% or whatever is when you’re up pk’ing the others).

Read full topic

item.title: Dream Nation <(^^,)> 420 server!
item.dc:creator: @Lewis3 Lewis)
item.description:
@Lewis3 wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:16, topic:325455”][quote author=Lewis) link=topic=421780.msg3100751#msg3100751 date=1263689669]
Have a war area of which both good and bad players war it out but make it so bad and bad can’t attack same with good and good.
[/quote]

So you go into this little chamber, and it has a countdown (from 10 minutes) when u pop in, it’s kinda like C wars, and you wait. Then both teams are teleported into some awesome place, and they duel it out. The winning players of the team get like either 50k each or 25k exp to a specified skill.[/quote]

Or last person standing has a choice to go back into its original place or choose again - good or evil.

Read full topic
